item.title: Lithuania to shoot down smuggling balloons, PM warns
item.description: Inga Ruginiene says she is taking the "strictest measures" over the balloons, used to transport cigarettes from Belarus.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa could be strongest ever to hit Jamaica
item.description: Melissa has been upgraded to a category five storm and could become Jamaica's strongest on record.

item.title: Trial begins for 10 accused of sexist cyber-bullying of Brigitte Macron
item.description: The defendants are accused of spreading unsubstantiated claims over Mrs Macron's gender and sexuality.

item.title: UN peacekeeping force in Lebanon shoots down Israeli drone
item.description: Unfil says the drone flew over a patrol in an "aggressive manner", but the Israeli military says it was gathering intelligence and posed no threat.

item.title: UN pleads for safe passage for civilians trapped in war-hit Sudan city
item.description: The fall of el-Fasher would cement the RSF's control of the west and reinforces a de facto split in the nation.
